title: Dreaming of Dragons
description: Previous Here Be Dragons LGBT Fantasy ParanormalLovers for centuries, Mordred and George's relationship is strong enough to withstand anything--or so they think.With dragons and magical creatures appearing every day, George risks everything, even to the point of losing his lover, to maintain the balance between the Realm of Dreams and the human world. Mordred can see George slipping away and, for the first time in his long life, insecurity creeps through.As the presence of old lovers, new friends, and deadly dragons cause cracks in their foundation to form, Mordred and George must discover how far they're willing to go to save their world and their love.Publisher's This book contains explicit sexual content, graphic language, and situations that some readers may find Anal play/intercourse, male/male sexual practices, violence.
author: T.A. Chase
